meanings.definition: A solid figure with many plane faces, typically more than three.
meanings.sent1: I learned about different polyhedra shapes in math class.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed building various polyhedra out of paper.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a sculpture of colorful polyhedra that looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: In his dream, the city was made of shimmering polyhedra floating in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used models of polyhedra to help students visualize geometric concepts.
